text:
Learn how to write the equation of a best fit line using two points

\begin{array}{l}\n\text { 8. } \\\n\frac{\text { og }}{\frac{P}{5}}(-10,3)(-5,1)(-1,-4) \\\n\quad(3,-7)(12,-12)\n\end{array}[imath]\text { 8. } [/imath] [imath]\frac{\text { og }}{\frac{P}{5}}(-10,3)(-5,1)(-1,-4) [/imath] [imath]\quad(3,-7)(12,-12)[/imath]
